meta.title: Krystian Hanek - Senior Backend Engineer
meta.description: Senior Backend Engineer with over 10 years of experience building production-grade distributed systems. Specialized in Django, AWS, and scalable cloud architecture.

hero.name: Krystian Hanek
hero.title: Senior Backend Engineer
hero.subtitle: Senior Backend Engineer specializing in scalable distributed systems and cloud architecture

about.title: About
about.content: I am a senior backend engineer with over a decade of experience building production-grade distributed systems. Throughout my career at Apptension, I have architected and delivered complex solutions using Django, AWS, and modern cloud-native technologies for clients across the United States, United Kingdom, South Africa, and Poland.
about.content2: My engineering journey began in startup environments, where I developed a strong foundation in solving complex technical challenges and delivering business value through software.

dmw.name: DMW
dmw.summary: Backend ownership and infrastructure-as-code for a secure, scalable production platform.
dmw.description: Designed and maintained backend services and authorization mechanisms for a production system. Owned cloud infrastructure using AWS CDK to support secure deployments, horizontal scaling, and stable runtime environments. Implemented reporting components tightly coupled with backend domain logic.
highlights: Designed and maintained authorization and access-control mechanisms
Owned AWS CDK infrastructure to enable repeatable deployments and horizontal scaling
Delivered reporting features aligned with backend domain logic

saas.name: Internal SaaS Boilerplate
saas.summary: Established observability standards for an internal backend platform.
saas.description: Introduced backend observability by integrating Prometheus and Grafana, enabling deeper insight into application behavior, performance bottlenecks, and error patterns in production.
highlights: Integrated Prometheus metrics and Grafana dashboards
Improved visibility into performance bottlenecks and error patterns
Enabled faster incident response with actionable monitoring

kandua.name: Kandua (formerly Home+), Santam
kandua.summary: Designed data flows and service boundaries for a serverless microservice system.
kandua.description: Designed backend architecture and data flows for a serverless, microservice-based system. Implemented inter-service communication, domain-driven service boundaries, and integrations with external providers (payments, utilities, emergency services).
highlights: Defined domain-driven service boundaries and inter-service communication
Implemented integrations with external providers (payments, utilities, emergency services)
Built event-driven components with reliability and maintainability in mind

worldexpo.name: World Expo, Dogstudio
worldexpo.summary: Implemented TypeScript backend features and search integration for a content-heavy platform.
worldexpo.description: Implemented backend features including database schema evolution, API development, and AWS Elasticsearch integration. Focused on data querying, performance, and maintainability in a TypeScript-based backend.
highlights: Developed APIs and managed database schema evolution
Integrated AWS Elasticsearch to support fast and flexible search
Optimized queries and code structure for long-term maintainability

questpass.name: Questpass (formerly Adquesto)
questpass.summary: Scaled backend for high-traffic advertising workloads, including video processing and reporting.
questpass.description: Backend systems supporting advertising platforms by introducing new media types (video), integrating AWS MediaConvert, and enhancing reporting and analytics endpoints. Optimized backend systems to handle high and unpredictable traffic peaks through caching strategies, architectural improvements, and systematic load testing. Designed and executed performance and stress testing scenarios.
highlights: Introduced a new video media type and integrated AWS MediaConvert
Optimized caching and architecture to handle unpredictable traffic spikes
Designed and executed load and stress testing scenarios

less.name: LESS (formerly CountMe)
less.summary: Evolved backend APIs for payments, verification, and personalized content; delivered auth migration.
less.description: Built and evolved backend APIs for personalized content, payments, and verification workflows. Implemented and later migrated authentication mechanisms (Auth0 → custom solution). Improved system resiliency through backend optimizations and comprehensive testing.
highlights: Built and extended APIs supporting payments and verification workflows
Migrated authentication from Auth0 to a custom solution
Improved resiliency through performance work and comprehensive testing
